title: 关于超能力怪物崩溃的问题
author: zhoulilong
txt_content:
服务器在加了超能力怪物这个mod后 如果玩家放置方块就会崩服 服务端是KCauldron在删除这个mod后就好了 请问有其他解决办法吗
这是崩溃报告
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: cn/academy/ability/block/AbilityInterferer
        at cn.paindar.academymonster.core.support.tile.AbilityInterfManager.onBlockPlaced(AbilityInterfManager.java:43)

        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler.invoke(ASMEventHandler.java:54)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:140)
        at net.minecraftforge.event.ForgeEventFactory.onPlayerMultiBlockPlace(ForgeEventFactory.java:60)
        at net.minecraftforge.common.ForgeHooks.onPlaceItemIntoWorld(ForgeHooks.java:593)
        at net.minecraft.item.ItemStack.func_77943_a(ItemStack.java:152)
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ItemInWorldManager.func_73078_a(ItemInWorldManager.java:495)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer.func_147346_a(NetHandlerPlayServer.java:853)
        at net.minecraft.network.play.client.C08PacketPlayerBlockPlacement.func_148833_a(SourceFile:60)
        at net.minecraft.network.play.client.C08PacketPlayerBlockPlacement.func_148833_a(SourceFile:9)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkManager.func_74428_b(NetworkManager.java:245)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkSystem.func_151269_c(NetworkSystem.java:173)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:991)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:431)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:809)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:669)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: cn.academy.ability.block.AbilityInterferer
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:191)

如果需要mod列表的话 我等会补上

replies.txt_content: 是不是缺少hAcademyCraft——学园都市这个mod

replies.author: zhoulilong
replies.txt_content:
840 发表于 2019-7-11 15:15
是不是缺少hAcademyCraft——学园都市这个mod
这个mod装了

replies.author: zhoulilong
replies.txt_content: 真就没人啊。是不是悬赏少了。
